attributes.action: Create specialist drug rehabilitation centres in the UK using benefits paid to users.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Create specialist drug rehabilitation centres across the UK using the money normally paid in benefits to drug users. These users should then be forced by court order to remain or attend these centres.

This would help cut off supply of money to drug dealers as drug users would not be recieving state benefits.
